com.view.XListView

枚举 PullToRefreshBase.Mode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<PullToRefreshBase.Mode>
      • com.view.XListView.PullToRefreshBase.Mode
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<PullToRefreshBase.Mode>
    封闭类:
    PullToRefreshBase<T extends View>

    public static enum PullToRefreshBase.Mode
extends java.lang.Enum<PullToRefreshBase.Mode>

    • 枚举常量概要

      枚举常量 
      枚举常量和说明
      BOTH
      Allow the user to both Pull from the start, from the end to refresh.
      DISABLED
      Disable all Pull-to-Refresh gesture and Refreshing handling
      MANUAL_REFRESH_ONLY
      Disables Pull-to-Refresh gesture handling, but allows manually setting the Refresh state via setRefreshing().
      PULL_FROM_END
      Only allow the user to Pull from the end of the Refreshable View to refresh.
      PULL_FROM_START
      Only allow the user to Pull from the start of the Refreshable View to refresh.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static PullToRefreshBase.Mode PULL_DOWN_TO_REFRESH
      已过时。 
      Use PULL_FROM_START from now on.
      static PullToRefreshBase.Mode PULL_UP_TO_REFRESH
      已过时。 
      Use PULL_FROM_END from now on.

    • 方法概要

      boolean showHeaderLoadingLayout()

      返回带有指定名称的该类型的枚举常量。

      按照声明该枚举类型的常量的顺序, 返回 包含这些常量的数组。

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • 枚举常量详细资料

      • DISABLED

        public static final PullToRefreshBase.Mode DISABLED
        Disable all Pull-to-Refresh gesture and Refreshing handling

      • PULL_FROM_START

        public static final PullToRefreshBase.Mode PULL_FROM_START
        Only allow the user to Pull from the start of the Refreshable View to refresh. The start is either the Top or Left, depending on the scrolling direction.

      • PULL_FROM_END

        public static final PullToRefreshBase.Mode PULL_FROM_END
        Only allow the user to Pull from the end of the Refreshable View to refresh. The start is either the Bottom or Right, depending on the scrolling direction.

      • BOTH

        public static final PullToRefreshBase.Mode BOTH
        Allow the user to both Pull from the start, from the end to refresh.

      • MANUAL_REFRESH_ONLY

        public static final PullToRefreshBase.Mode MANUAL_REFRESH_ONLY
        Disables Pull-to-Refresh gesture handling, but allows manually setting the Refresh state via setRefreshing().

    • 字段详细资料

      • PULL_DOWN_TO_REFRESH

        public static PullToRefreshBase.Mode PULL_DOWN_TO_REFRESH
        已过时。 Use PULL_FROM_START from now on.

      • PULL_UP_TO_REFRESH

        public static PullToRefreshBase.Mode PULL_UP_TO_REFRESH
        已过时。 Use PULL_FROM_END from now on.

    • 方法详细资料

      • values

        public static PullToRefreshBase.Mode[] values()
        按照声明该枚举类型的常量的顺序, 返回 包含这些常量的数组。该方法可用于迭代 常量, 如下所示: 
        for (PullToRefreshBase.Mode c : PullToRefreshBase.Mode.values())
    System.out.println(c);
        返回:
        按照声明该枚举类型的常量的顺序返回的包含这些常量的数组

      • valueOf

        public static PullToRefreshBase.Mode valueOf(java.lang.String name)
        返回带有指定名称的该类型的枚举常量。 字符串必须与用于声明该类型的枚举常量的 标识符完全匹配。(不允许有多余 的空格字符。)
        参数:
        name - 要返回的枚举常量的名称。
        返回:
        返回带有指定名称的枚举常量
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - 如果该枚举类型没有带有指定名称的常量
        java.lang.NullPointerException - 如果参数为空值

      • showHeaderLoadingLayout

        public boolean showHeaderLoadingLayout()
        返回:
        true if this mode wants the Loading Layout Header to be shown

      • showFooterLoadingLayout

        public boolean showFooterLoadingLayout()
        返回:
        true if this mode wants the Loading Layout Footer to be shown
